New / Taschenbuch

Taschenbuch. Condition: Neu. Neuware - The story is told in flashback by Clem, when he is living and working in New York City as a designer, and moves from the past of his parents and grandmother to his own teenage years. Not only the threat of explosions, but actual ones as well in all its pain and glory. Seller Inventory # 9781844281008

Life An Exploded Diagram

Mal Peet

Published by Walker, 2011

ISBN 10: 1844281000 / ISBN 13: 9781844281008

New / Softcover

Quantity: 5 available

Condition: New. 2011. Paperback. Clem Ackroyd lives with his parents and grandmother in a claustrophobic home too small to accommodate their larger-than-life characters in the bleak Norlfolk countryside. Clem's life changes irrevocably when he meets Frankie, the daughter of a wealthy farmer, and experiences first love, in all its pain and glory. Num Pages: 412 pages. BIC Classification: 5AQ; YFM.
